iti47:4.1: “Jāgaro cassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhu vihareyya sato sampajāno samāhito pamudito vippasanno ca tattha kālavipassī ca kusalesu dhammesu.
iti47:4.2: Jāgarassa, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno viharato satassa sampajānassa samāhitassa pamuditassa vippasannassa tattha kālavipassino kusalesu dhammesu dvinnaṃ phalānaṃ aññataraṃ phalaṃ pāṭikaṅkhaṃ—
iti47:4.3: diṭṭheva dhamme aññā, sati vā upādisese anāgāmitā”ti.
iti47:8.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
